column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: nationality. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix nationality: <http://www.example.org/nationality#> .nationality:Nationality rdf:type rdfs:Class .nationality:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .nationality:hasNationality rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain nationality:Person ;    rdfs:range nationality:Nationality .nationality:American rdf:type nationality:Nationality ;    rdfs:label "American"^^xsd:string .nationality:French rdf:type nationality:Nationality ;    rdfs:label "French"^^xsd:string .nationality:Chinese rdf:type nationality:Nationality ;    rdfs:label "Chinese"^^xsd:string .nationality:JohnDoe rdf:type nationality:Person ;    nationality:hasNationality nationality:American .    nationality:JaneDoe rdf:type nationality:Person ;    nationality:hasNationality nationality:French .    nationality:LiuWei rdf:type nationality:Person ;    nationality:hasNationality nationality:Chinese .
